author: Ryan Daws
description:
A threat campaign has been targeting software developers through GitHub repos that, at first glance, look completely legitimate. Security researchers from ReversingLabs found over 60 GitHub repos containing what appeared to be ordinary hacking tools written in Python. But, look a bit closer – or rather, scroll a bit further right – and you’d find... Read more »

The post Look right: Threat campaign fooling developers in GitHub repos appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Look right: Threat campaign fooling developers in GitHub repos
